title: Australian Gold Moisture Lock Hydrating Tan Extender 473ml
description: Enriched with aloe, this ultra-hydrating formula contains natural oils, antioxidants, and vitamins to nourish skin. A bestseller to bring with you on holiday as a hydrating after-sun, and also to use daily for longer-lasting tan results. What’s inside? Hydrating oils: sunflower seed oil and olive fruit oil retain moisture in the skin, making it a perfect after-sun product to rejuvenate and nourish skin. Aloevera: natural soothing properties for deeply conditioned skin and a gentle cooling feel. Australian native tea tree oil: used to help provide powerful antioxidant properties to gently cleanse for smooth skin and also provides a soothing, cooling feel. Specially formulated - PABA-free, dye-free, alcohol-free, and gluten-free. Fragrance: classic cocoa dreams. Size - 237ml, but also available in a 473ml bottle. By applying a tan extender, your skin will be kept soft, smooth, and healthy after a day at the beach. This will also encourage a longer-lasting, healthy, golden glow, making it perfect for holding onto that post-holiday sunkiss. Top tip: Moisture Lock is the perfect holiday product to pair up with your sun cream! Use it every day after you shower to lock in your holiday tan. When is best to apply your Australian Gold Moisture Lock Tan Extender? After showering or bathing to restore hydration - hot water can strip skin of its natural oils. After tanning. Daily!

title: Australian Gold SPF 15 Instant Bronzer Spray Gel Suncream 237ml
description: Australian Gold’s Bronze SPF 15 Spray Gel with Bronzer provides top-quality, certified Broad Spectrum sun protection along with a skincare boost for anti-ageing and softened skin. What’s inside?Caramel: Delivers an instant glow for a gorgeous sun-kissed feel and combats flushed tones in the skin for a golden tan. This bronzer washes away easily with water without staining the skin Kakadu Plum: The fruit with the highest level of vitamin C, which boosts the sun cream’s effectiveness while protecting from free radicals for an anti-ageing benefit Aloe Vera: Deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin, while providing natural skin-soothing properties Moisturisers: Sunflower Seed Oil and Olive Fruit Oil provide deep hydration and nourishment for soft, moisturised skin Australian Tea Tree Oil: A natural antibacterial that works to prevent after-tan odours, leaving you feeling and smelling fresh after a day in the sun Free from parabens, PABA, dyes, alcohol, and gluten. Classic CocoaDreams fragrance. In a 237ml bottle. The gel consistency absorbs quickly into the skin without a greasy after-feel. Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, and the easy-to-use pump spray makes this perfect for a hassle-free sunscreen experience. Top Tip: For safe tanning, start with a medium to high protection sun cream before transitioning to lower protection as your tan develops. How to apply:Apply 20 minutes before sun exposure Can be layered with tanning lotion, which should be applied immediately before sun exposure Reapply every 2 hours as a minimum, or more frequently if swimming, sweating, or towel drying

title: Australian Gold SPF 30 Instant Bronzer Lotion Suncream 237ml
description: Australian Gold SPF 30 Lotion with Bronzer. The LED Face Mask will not work if the remote is not plugged into the mask How to use: Once your LED Face Mask is fully assembled, place the LED Face Mask onto your face and securely attach the straps around the crown of your head Long press the On/Off button on the remote. title: Clarins Total Eye Cream Lift 15ml 15ml
description: The complete eye lifting serum with Clarins' “LIFT” expertise, specifically designed to enhance the eye area. Refillable. Please note, the refill is only compatible with NEW Total Eye Lift and cannot be used separately. Visible eye lift effect in 30 seconds. Reduces and smooths the appearance of wrinkles. Replenishes the eye contour. Skin regains its elasticity and firmness. Visibly reduces puffiness and dark circles. Moisturises and nourishes the skin. Now refillable. The iconic Clarins Total Eye Lift serum has been developed with Clarins' plant-powered expertise. It's lightweight, silky yet luxurious texture melts into skin for an instant effect, leaving your gaze visibly refreshed, rested, and lifted. Our eye lift serum is your all-in-one solution for younger-looking eyes, working from brow to under-eye in a single swipe, restoring firmness and radiance over time, without heaviness or irritation. Formulated with: [RETINOL-LIKE TECHNOLOGY] - Powerful organic harungana extract is as effective as retinol1 whilst being gentle on the eye area. Exclusive to Clarins, this patented2 ingredient boosts collagen3. It is combined with a new Clarins active: biotechnology-derived red jania extract for a long-term lifting effect on the eye area. PRO-TIGHTENING MATRIX - This comfortable balm provides an instant tightening effect to improve skin elasticity by +53%4. New refillable version.5 1 Comparative clinical study conducted on anti-wrinkle and smoothing effectiveness on 46 women applying a formula containing either organic harungana extract or retinol with the same % of ingredient as the finished product, over 56 days. 2 Two Clarins patents registered in France on the effectiveness of harungana extract. 3 In vitro test on harungana extract. 4 Instrumental test on silicone support. 5 The refill cannot be used on its own. Use: Every day, morning and/or night. To optimise the lifting effect, place the index and middle fingers at the inner corners of the eye underneath the eyebrows. Then slide the index fingers over the upper lids to the temples, and finally the middle fingers along the lower lids to the temples.

title: Tog 24 Green Womens Alva Waterproof Coats
description: When it comes to waterproof jackets, it doesn’t get much more stylish than the Alva. Designed in the classic trench-coat silhouette, the Alva is a great-looking coat that also comes with heaps of practical features. Its fully taped seams and waterproof coating ensure you keep the rain out and the warmth in, which is ideal for when the rain pours and the winds blow. Also, to ensure you’re ready for whatever the weather throws at you, the removable and adjustable hood comes complete with drawcords at the opening, while the handy two-way zip provides extra mobility. What’s more, the toggle adjusters on the waist offer that ''cinched-in'' feel, which is both figure-flattering and great for keeping your torso toasty. With style and substance in abundance, the Alva is your trusty companion for keeping you dry and stylish in the unpredictable British weather. Studio model Natasha is wearing size 8 and is 5'10'', waist 25.5'', hips 35''.

title: Mountain Warehouse Black Alaskan Womens 3-in-1 Waterproof Jacket
description: Our Alaskan Womens 3 in 1 Short Jacket has a waterproof outer jacket and a padded inner jacket.
